short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Captures Agricola card data from boardgamearena.com and sends it to a remote server, to be displayed in a Twitch overlay.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is intended for Twitch streamers streaming Agricola on boardgamearena.com.

When enabled for the tab, the extension gathers data on the cards in play, including their position on the screen, and sends them to a remote server.

The remote server then integrates with a Twitch extension, allowing viewers to click on cards in the stream and see a larger version with non-blurry text.
